Talk_1107:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>Ah. This is quite the...outfit...you've put
together. Although perhaps it could be a
little more, um, coordinated.
That is, a complete set would really work
for you.
Near_03: I hope I'll stay dry here...
Talk_1108:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sad>My boyfriend went to buy some of the
<clr:0000>fire-resistant clothes<clr:ffff> sold in Goron City,
but he hasn't come back.
I went part of the way with him, but some
Gorons with <clr:0000>strange-looking rocks <clr:ffff>started
bothering us.
I got scared and came back on my own...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Luckily, I hear <clr:0000>Goron City <clr:ffff>is completely
safe again.<sp:0:4:0>There shouldn't be anything else keeping
him away, but he still hasn't come back.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>I wonder what in the world he's doing...
Talk_1109:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_01>Ah! Those clothes! Are they from
Goron City?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Very, very nice. I should get some
for myself...
Talk_1110:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sad>My boyfriend went to buy some of the
<clr:0000>fire-resistant clothes<clr:ffff> sold in Goron City,
but he hasn't come back.
I've heard that the city is already safe
again, so what in the world is taking him
so long?
Talk_1111:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Your clothes! So coordinated! Fabulous.
You're clearly well-versed in the ways
of fashion.
Talk_1112:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_01>Ah! Those clothes! Are they from
Goron City?!<sp:0:4:0>It's this season's hottest trend to have
the complete three-piece set. You must
be made of rupees!
<sp:3:0:2:0801>They look fabulous. Just fabulous!
<sp:0:2:2:5000>I'm so jealous.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_1113:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_01>Yes, yes. Can I help you? Or did you come
to show off to me again?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100>*sigh* I can't even stay upset. No matter
how many times I see the set, it still looks
absolutely marvelous.
I want it too...
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_00>Sorry. My eye for fashion can't help but
see what it sees.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>I'm forever tempted by the latest styles.
The same is true for my boyfriend.<sp:0:4:0>The two of us were going to Goron City to
buy their trendy <clr:0000>fire-resistant clothes<clr:ffff>...

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But when we were about to arrive, we
got tangled up with some Gorons with
<clr:0000>strange-looking rocks<clr:ffff>.
I got scared and came back on my own.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>If you're going to <clr:0000>Goron City<clr:ffff>, then you
should be very careful.
Talk_1100:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Wakeup_01>...Kanny? You're back? I was waiting
and waiting and just shut my eyes for
a moment...<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0401>...Oh, I'm sorry. You're definitely not
my boyfriend.
Talk_1114:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_01>Ah! Those clothes! Are they from
Goron City?!<sp:0:4:0>And you're only one piece away from a
complete set?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Very, very nice. I should get some
for myself...
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Wait, this isn't the time to be thinking
about fashion.<sp:0:4:0>My boyfriend went to go buy <clr:0000>fire-resistant
clothes<clr:ffff> in Goron City. He still hasn't
come back...
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>I hope he's not still caught up with those Gorons
with the <clr:0000>strange-looking rocks<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>If you're going to <clr:0000>Goron City<clr:ffff>, then you
should be very careful.
Talk_1115:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseL>Oh my! That's hardly appropriate attire for
polite company, is it?<sp:0:4:0>I'm not interested in conversation with
someone who can't be bothered to dress
properly, so will you please leave me be?
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>It's so strange. I thought the Gorons were
gentle and kind.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal>I wonder if it has something to do with those
<clr:0000>strangely shaped rocks<clr:ffff>...<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:3:0:2:0701>I'm glad that my boyfriend went to buy<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:0:2:2:6400>
the <clr:0000>fire-resistant clothes<clr:ffff>, but I am a
little worried...
If you're going to <clr:0000>Goron City<clr:ffff>, then you
should be very careful.
Talk_1102:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Excuse you! Don't you see the rain?
I'm not interested in talking where my
precious clothes will get wet!
Talk_1116:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseL>E-<sp:5:1:0>excuse you! You ARE persistent!<sp:0:4:0>I already told you that I'm not interested
in conversation with someone who isn't
dressed properly. So go away!
